name: 网瘾少年2005 Internet addicted youth 2005
name_original: 网瘾少年2005 Internet addicted youth 2005
description:
Game introduction





Netjunker 2005 is a story-oriented role-playing game that incorporates a variety of scenario-appropriate gameplay. In the game, you will play the role of Wang Xiaoleng, a young high school Internet addict, and face the criticism of Internet addiction and games from teachers, classmates and parents in the early 20th century. In the case of witnessing the collapse of the "addict" around him, I help Wang Xiaoleng to re-examine his ideal and make his own choice at the fork of life.

The story took place in a small county in 2005, coincided with the publication of the article "When Young people are trapped in the Internet", the major universities across the country a stone aroused thousands of waves, have cracked down on the behavior of online games, every teacher parents regard computer games as drugs, floods and beasts.

In this context, you will play the leading role of Wang Xiaoleng, opening a unique experience of Internet addiction youth, in the face of school teachers to suppress the Internet behavior, in the face of ferocious school violence, in the face of social oppression of bullies, in the face of Internet addiction youth miserable life. In this environment, does sticking to your original belief matter? Or is it important to be an ordinary student and obey what parents and teachers want? All this is waiting for you to help Wang Xiaoleng choose.

The game features the following gameplay:



■ In the social environment of the early 20th century, I faced the criticism of Internet addiction and games from teachers, classmates and parents.

■ Interesting War3-like battle, with the form of small games to bring you to experience the 2005 esports.

■ Personality switch, different personalities and NPCS can have different interactions.

■ Jumping and light decryption.

■ Dramatic plot twists.

■ Simple and unadorned pixel style.

■ About 3-4 hours.

Write at the end



The original script of "Internet Addiction 2005" is based on inspirational esports, and the reason why I chose 2005 is because Sky won the WCG in that year. But later, I think the protagonist should not just stand on the podium, can take a step forward bravely in that era, even if the fall in disgrace, at that moment he is my hero. And so, this is the version of "Junkie 2005," a less inspiring story, but a brave one.

I hope this story takes you back to that year. I hope it touches you.

Here, also to the first group of unknown esports salute.
